data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kashima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Tokyo's area.
In the minute 4, Tokyo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kashima.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Kashima to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Akihiro Hayashi.
In the minute 10, Tokyo's Akihiro Hayashi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Kashima's Ryotaro Araki is on target but unsuccessful.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 13, Tokyo's Adailton gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 14, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 16, Tokyo needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Ryotaro Araki's header is off-target for Kashima.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo's Adailton attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 20, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 22, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Kashima push forward at Ajinomoto Stadium and Everaldo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Tokyo defence.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Hiroyuki Kimura waits before resuming play because Akihiro Hayashi for Tokyo is still down.
In the minute 28, Tokyo's Akihiro Hayashi is back in action after a slight knock.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 29, Kashima's Ryota Nagaki gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Tokyo.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
In the minute 30, Tokyo have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 33, Kashima surge into the attack at Ajinomoto Stadium but Everaldo’s header is off-target.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 34, Arthur Silva (Tokyo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Tokyo's Tsuyoshi Watanabe misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Adailton for Tokyo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick Tokyo.
In the minute 38, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Adailton is back on his feet again.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 40, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
The match at Ajinomoto Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tsuyoshi Watanabe, who is down injured.
Tsuyoshi Watanabe for Tokyo is back on the field again.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo drive upfield and Adailton gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashima defender.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in Kashima.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 45, In Tokyo, Tomoya Inukai (Kashima) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Kashima at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has come to a close in Tokyo.
In the minute 45, Ikuma Sekigawa blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-0.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Tokyo pushes forward through Taichi Hara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tokyo are coming forward and Ryoya Ogawa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
In the minute 48, Goal! Everaldo equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Goal kick for Kashima at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 51, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Tokyo.
Attention is being given to Kashima’s Shoma Doi and play has been suspended briefly.
Shoma Doi is back on the pitch.
In the minute 57, Goal! Juan Alano gives Kashima a 1-2 lead.
Ryotaro Araki with an assist there.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Tokyo.
In the minute 60, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
The home team replace Adailton with Kensuke Nagai.
Kenta Hasegawa (Tokyo) is making a second substitution, with Diego Oliveira replacing Takuya Uchida.
In the minute 60, Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's third substitution at Ajinomoto Stadium with Shuto Abe replacing Hirotaka Mita.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 62, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Tokyo.
Arthur Silva for Tokyo has been booked by Hiroyuki Kimura and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 64, Zago (Kashima) has taken off Shoma Doi who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ryuji Izumi is the replacement.
Leo Silva is replacing Ryota Nagaki for the away team.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 65, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
In the minute 67, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Kashima!
In the minute 71, Free kick Kashima.
Kashima advance rapidly upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura blows for offside.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, Kashima push forward at Ajinomoto Stadium and Juan Alano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tokyo defence.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Kashima are pushing forward but Kento Misao's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Kazuya Konno is replacing Yojiro Takahagi for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 77, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Throw-in for Kashima at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 79, Katsuya Nagato (Kashima) has received a yellow card from Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 81, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Kashima's Juan Alano gets in a shot on goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kashima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 82, Juan Alano of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tatsuki Nara is on a sub for Juan Alano for Kashima.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kashima close to the penalty box.
In Tokyo, Everaldo of Kashima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, At Ajinomoto Stadium, Kento Misao has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Arthur Silva of Tokyo gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Hiroyuki Kimura will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Kashima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Shuto Abe's header is off-target for Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
The away team have replaced Ryotaro Araki with Yasushi Endo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Zago.
